author: Elizabeth Bagwell
text:
The International Town & Gown Association is requesting proposals for the 2014 Conference in Clemson, South Carolina. Please submit ideas by January 31, 2014. To view conference themes/tracks and details, click on the link below:
http://archive.constantcontact.com/fs111/1102372300152/archive/1116341929114.html
You may also visit our conference website at www.itgau.org/2014conference. 
Contact Beth Bagwell for more information at beth@itgau.org.
title: ITGA 2014 Call for Proposals
